# iosxr_l2vpn_bridge_group_bridge_domain_vfi (Data Source)

This data source can read the L2VPN Bridge Group Bridge Domain VFI configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_l2vpn_bridge_group_bridge_domain_vfi" "example" {
  bridge_group_name  = "BG123"
  bridge_domain_name = "BD123"
  vfi_name           = "VFI1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bridge_domain_name` (String) Configure bridge domain
- `bridge_group_name` (String) Specify the group the bridge belongs to
- `vfi_name` (String) Specify the virtual forwarding interface name

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `autodiscovery_bgp` (Boolean) Enable BGP auto-discovery in this VFI
- `autodiscovery_bgp_control_word` (Boolean) Enable control-word for BGP-Autodiscovered PWs for this VFI
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_auto` (Boolean) Automatic route distinguisher
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_four_byte_as_index` (Number) AS:nn (hex or decimal format)
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_four_byte_as_number` (Number) Four Byte AS number
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_ipv4_address` (String) IP address
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_ipv4_address_index` (Number) IP-address:nn (hex or decimal format)
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_two_byte_as_index` (Number) AS:nn (hex or decimal format)
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_two_byte_as_number` (Number) Two Byte AS number
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_policy_export` (String) Export route policy
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_ipv4_address_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_two_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_four_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_ipv4_address_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_two_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_ipv4_address_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_two_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp` (Boolean) Enable BGP signaling protocol for this VFI
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_both` (Boolean) Insert/Discard Flow label when transmit/recceive
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_receive` (Boolean) Discard Flow label when receive
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_static` (Boolean) Set Flow label parameters statically
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_transmit` (Boolean) Insert Flow label when transmit
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_ve_id` (Number) Local Virtual Edge Identifier (VE ID)
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_ve_range` (Number) Local Virtual Edge Block Configurable Range
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp` (Boolean) Enable LDP signaling protocol for this VFI
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_ipv4_address` (String) IP address
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_ipv4_address_index` (Number) IP-address:nn (hex or decimal format)
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_load_balancing_flow_label_both` (Boolean) Insert/Discard Flow label when transmit/recceive
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_load_balancing_flow_label_receive` (Boolean) Discard Flow label when receive
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_load_balancing_flow_label_static` (Boolean) Set Flow label parameters statically
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_load_balancing_flow_label_transmit` (Boolean) Insert Flow label when transmit
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_two_byte_as_format` (Number) AS:nn (hex or decimal format)
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_ldp_vpls_id_two_byte_as_number` (Number) Two Byte AS number
- `autodiscovery_bgp_table_policy` (String) Configure policy for installation of forwarding data to L2FIB
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `multicast_p2mp` (Boolean) Enable point to multi-point pseudowire in this VFI
- `multicast_p2mp_signaling_protocol_bgp` (Boolean) Use BGP for signaling
- `multicast_p2mp_transport_rsvp_te` (Boolean) Use RSVP-TE as transport
- `multicast_p2mp_transport_rsvp_te_attribute_set_p2mp_te` (String) TE tunnel attribute set name
- `neighbors` (Attributes List) Specify the peer to cross connect (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors))
- `shutdown` (Boolean) shutdown the Virtual Forwarding Interface
- `vpn_id` (Number) VPN Identifier (VPN ID)

<a id="nestedatt--neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbors`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String) IPv4 address of the peer
- `dhcp_ipv4_none` (Boolean) Disable DHCP snooping
- `dhcp_ipv4_snooping_profile` (String) Attach a DHCP profile
- `igmp_snooping_profile` (String) Attach an IGMP profile
- `mld_snooping_profile` (String) Attach a MLD profile
- `mpls_static_label_local` (Number) Local pseudowire label
- `mpls_static_label_remote` (Number) Remote pseudowire label
- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use for this pseudowire
- `pw_id` (Number) Specify the pseudowire id
- `static_mac_addresses` (Attributes List) Static MAC address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors--static_mac_addresses))

<a id="nestedatt--neighbors--static_mac_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbors.static_mac_addresses`

Read-Only:

- `mac_address` (String) Static MAC address
